doc:
Charles Villiers (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charles_Villiers_(actor) 0 Charles Villiers was an Australian actor and occasional director who appeared in many silent films. According to a contemporary report, "there is probably no actor in Australia that has done more consistent picture work than Mr. Yilliers, both as heavy lead, and director." He was particularly well known for playing villains. Charles_Villiers was an_Australian_actor and occasional_director who appeared in many_silent_films . According to a_contemporary_report , " there is probably no_actor in Australia that has_done more_consistent_picture_work than Mr._Yilliers , both as heavy_lead , and director . " He was_particularly_well_known for playing_villains .
